items.sentence: If you shout from the top of a cliff, you can hear the echo of your voice.
The tennis players both walked off the court and headed toward their cars.
In Esperanto an adjective ends in "a." The plural is formed by adding "j."
Tom and Mary exchanged a wave across the street as they passed each other.
I'm sorry I'm late, but I got tied up with something I wasn't counting on.
